import React, { useState } from 'react' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import cl from './style.module.css' import djostik1 from '../images/djostik1.png' import djostik2 from '../images/djostik2.png' import djostik3 from '../images/djostik3.png' import djostik4 from '../images/djostik4.png' import djostik5 from '../images/djostik5.png' import { ReactComponent as Sart } from '../images/star.svg' import { ReactComponent as EmptyStar } from '../images/emptystar.svg' import { ReactComponent as BlueCircle } from '../images/bluecircle.svg' import { ReactComponent as RedCircle } from '../images/crimsoncircle.svg' import { ReactComponent as Minus } from '../images/minus.svg' import { ReactComponent as Plus } from '../images/plus.svg' import { ReactComponent as WishHeart } from '../images/wishheart.svg' import { ReactComponent as Delivery } from '../images/delivery.svg' export default function DetailsPage() { const [itemCount, setItemCount] = useState(0) const [itemDetails, setItemDetails] = useState([ { id: 1, itemName: 'Havic HV G-92 Gamepad', rating: 4, reviews: 150, instock: true, price: 192.00, aboutItem: 'PlayStation 5 Controller Skin High quality vinyl with air channel adhesive for easy bubble free install & mess free removal Pressure sensitive.', colours: ['blue', 'red'], sizes: ['xs', 's', 'm', 'l', 'xl'] } ]) function getrating(num) { const starList = [] const emptyStarList = [] for (let i = 1; i <= num; i++) { starList.push() } for (let i = 1; i <= 5 - num; i++) { emptyStarList.push() } return starList.concat(emptyStarList) } function getColours(coloursArr) { const colours = [] const filteredColoursList = [] for (let item of coloursArr) { if (!filteredColoursList.includes(item)) { filteredColoursList.push(item) } } for (let item of filteredColoursList) { colours.push(
) } return colours } function addItem() { setItemCount(prev => prev + 1) } function minusItem() { if (itemCount > 0) { setItemCount(prev => prev - 1) } } function addWishList() { document.getElementById('wishHeart').classList.toggle('qushildi') } return ( <>

Acount / Gaming / Havic HV G-92 Gamepad

{ itemDetails.map(i => <>

{i.itemName}

{ getrating(i.rating) } 
({i.reviews} Reviews)  |  {i.instock ? 'In Stock' : 'qomadi'}

${i.price}

{i.aboutItem}

Colours:

{ getColours(i.colours) }

Size:

{ i.sizes.map(item =>

{item}

) }
) }

{itemCount}

Free Delivery

Enter your postal code for Delivery Availability

) }
